code:
graph TD
    subgraph Knowledge_Base
        D[Education_StudentDB]
        C[Education_StudentDB]
        D --> |1a. Chunk & Process| C
    end

    DB[Education_GradeSync]
    Knowledge_Base -->|1b. Generate Embeddings| DB

    Q[Education_GradeSync]
    E[Education_LMS_Portal]
    Q -->|2a. Generate_Embedding| E
    E -->|2b. Vector Similarity Search| DB

    CTX[Education_ContentCDN]
    DB -->|3 Retrieve Relevant Chunks| CTX
    
    P[Education_LMS_Portal]
    Q -->|"4a. Combine"| P
    CTX -->|"4b. Combine"| P
    
    LLM[Education_LMS_Portal]
    R[Education_LMS_Portal]
    P -->|5 Send to LLM| LLM
    LLM -->|6 Generate Response| R
